page.title: 08A weekend - by Carole Ward
page.content: My family-dad,mum,brother John,sister Phyllis and I,live in Pinkston Drive. I am in Primary 7 at Sighthill School. {Sat.1:6:85}I had breakfast and went to the shops for messages.Phyllis and I sunbathed on the grass.At 1430 we both went to Sauchiehall St.We had icecream in the Savoy Centre.After dinner at 1745,I played on my bike.My uncle and aunt came to visit.I did a crossword with my Uncle. At 0115,I went to bed. {Sun.2:6:85}Up at 0945,a shower,dressed then breakfast.We went to Springburn Parish Church where we go to the Youth Fellowship.After lunch I sunbathed and at 1400 went in to watch television.I went for icecream after the programme "Eastenders".I went out to play with my pals.After dinner I did the dishes. Phyllis and I changed and went to the Youth Fellowship.When we returned home I went to bed at 2230.
